message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.DS 

This paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category as it deals with personalized recommendation systems. It also involves similarity-based methods, which are commonly used in recommendation systems and can be considered a machine learning task, thus making it relevant to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-category. Additionally, the paper proposes a new personalized recommendation index, which involves the use of mutual correction, making it relevant to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. The paper also involves experiments and analysis, which can be considered a data science task, making it relevant to the Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-category. Finally, the paper involves computations and algorithms, making it relevant to the Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-category.
